dialogue: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Spirit was hurtling to the ground at top speeds
and continued to do so for some time.
But as she got closer to the ground, her ship slowed down
until it was hovering just above ground level.
AAAHHHHHHHhhhh...huh? I'm...alive? What..?
Spirit didn't understand how she managed to survive.
But after hearing her ship make strange noises
she decided those questions were better left for on the ground.
Spirit jumped out of the ship.
...okay, weird hovering ship aside, where am I?
Spirit looked around for some sign of anything to tell her
where exactly she was. But she saw nothing of note.
Is there really nothing here? Wait, what was that?
Suddenly, tremors shook the ground.
Crap! What the hell?! I can't move!?
A small crack broke into existence in the ground in front of Spirit.
It slowly cracked wider and wider.
Spirit was stuck in place, forced to watch
as 'something' reached out of the crack and pulled itself out.
Once it finally reached the surface, the tremors stopped.
You...what are you?
Mrp?
All the tension in Spirit's body released
when she looked at the thing before her.
Hey there, little guy...Are you the one who stopped my ship?
Mnrpp! Mrnp!
The...creature...jumped around eagerly.
Huh, thanks then. Do you know where we are?
Mnr?
The creature tilted its head in confusion.
Right, that makes sense.
Great, now how am I going to get that message to the camp?
If my ship wasn't destroyed, I could get going but...
Mmmmrrn!
The creature started releasing light, and Spirit's ship glowed as well.
Spirit was blinded for a few moments, but when she
opened her eyes, her ship was in perfect condition.
You...did you do that?
Mrrrrnp!
Huh. Well, I need to get going. Bye! Thanks for the help!
Spirit was climbing up her ship, when the creature let out a noise.
MMMMRRRNNNNP!
What's wrong?
MMMMNRRPPP!
...Do you want to go with me?
MMMMRRNNP!
Alright. come along.
The creature levitates onto the ship with Spirit.
Alright, we need to come up with a name for you.
Mnrp?
